body.name: Feihe 22 Inch TV, FHD LED Flat Screen TV 1080p IPS Display w/Digital Dual Tuners ATSC/HDMI/VGA/AV/USB, 12 Volt RV TV Built in Dual Speakers Suitable for Kitchen/RV/Caravan and Boat(2022 Model)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 mins
features: 📺 【Visual Enjoyment & Panoramic Viewing】This 22 inch TV（Diagonal Size: 21.5"）with IPS technology design gives you brilliant visuals and unforgettable quality, Besides, the 178° wide viewing angle of this TV 19 inch allows you to enjoy a clear, sharp, and delicate images at any angle.

📺 【Endless Connectivity】: Access free over-the-air broadcasts by connecting your antenna to this flat screen HD TV, or connect the cable box for your satellite dish. It also supports compatible with Computer,DVR,Apple TV, Amazon Firestick, Roku, Slingbox, Chromecast, WIFI Box ,DVD players.

📺 【Bundle of Features】: 22 inch flat screen TV has potential features for you to not settle for less. HDMI、VGA and USB inputs are connected with external audio and video playback. AV input is there to use with DVD players or Game Systems. Built in speaker for party while Headphone Jack is for private viewing, in addition, ATSC Tuner and Remote Control make this a potential move TV.

📺 【Kitchen & RV TV】: Wall-mountable TV is designed specifically to make your small and compact area in the house quite useful. You can enjoy watching your favorite shows and a lot more without worrying of putting this under cabinet tv at a special dedicated place. This portable tv is enough to be a good companion of yours, while you’re on the go in a truck, on RV camping or even if you have a tight kitchen space for your 12 volt tv.

📺 【Unique Remote Control】:Control your TV with one remote control with clear every button function, very easy to use.(Note: Because the remote control code is different，19"TV only works with the included remote, not compatible with any cable service provided remote or universal remotes,Require user to have Two remote controls to tv.)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Q: Does work with a Comcast/Cable/Verizon/Xfinity/Spectrum/Fios remote? A: You have to use two remotes; Use the Feihe remote for volume countries and to turn it off. Use your Comcast/Cable/Verizon/Xfinity/Spectrum/Fios remote control for everything else,the network providers do not recognize the manufacturer.Model number of TV was not able to be found. Q: How to use the antenna with Feihe 19 inch tv? A: It all depends on your local reception and where the TV is located in the house（Closer to the window works better）in order to pick up a signal. Use an indoor antenna, but only receive several channels if you live close to mountains and have poor reception without a dish or cable. Other areas, with an antenna are more successful. When the signal is strong the picture is good! Q: TV not compatible with our cable TV provider? A: First: The cable box needs to support the CEC function Second: Then the cable box should be set to open the CEC function Third: TV under HDMI channel, select MENU->OPTION->HDMI CEC->Select the last DeviceList, search for CEC support Search for the channel, then use Feihe's remote control to remote control the TV box. Q: What if the TV speaker does not work, the screen is broken (or Black / Blue Vertical Line), or the remote control does not work? A: Please contact the seller in time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We were really leery about ordering this tv with all the negative reviews but decided to take a chance. So glad we did. The picture is very clear and the colors are vibrant. The sound is great. Lots of reviewers said it sounded like a tin can but this sound is perfect - no need to hook up to speakers. We purchased this for the kitchen, to replace a 19" Phillips that conked out after many years. The size is perfect for our countertop. It's nice and compact. without a lot of bulk. The fact that you can take this along while traveling is definitely a plus. It comes with the cord that plugs into your car, boat or RV. And, the screen does tilt for different viewing angles. My husband just loosened the two screws on the stand a little and voila! We don't have cable and just use the antenna and firestick. Both play without a problem. Scanning with the antenna picked up over 60 channels alone. Only one minor concern - No where on this tv or the instructions does it list the Feihe brand name, just ATSC. Otherwise, very happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits 18 inch horizontal space, very good picture
reviews.reviewText: Very good picture. Also works on 12 volts (car), adapter provided. I purchased this because it fit the space I had available. Remote = fair, rudimentary. Sound is good. Reception from off air is very good. I would purchase this brand again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad design, TV turns on every time it's connected to 12V
reviews.reviewText: Every time TV is powered, it'll turn on, doesn't matter if it was turned off prior to disconnecting power. Very annoying if TV is wired to a breaker panel that also powers other appliances, because you have to manually turn it off. Tech support was useless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Picture and Sound
reviews.reviewText: It got good reviews and in my opinion this product delivered as advertised.

reviews.reviewText: The TV arrived on time and is working well so far. The picture is clear and the sound is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with Dish Network remote
reviews.reviewText: With a Dish Network remote (54.0) and the "learn commands" feature of the remote, was able to program Dish Remote from the included remote. Now I just have one remote for channels, volume (up and down) and power. Perfect for my application. Now, let's see how long it lasts .....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars TV is mediocre at best.
reviews.reviewText: I got this TV to put in a small camper, so it's not a primary use TV for sure. The real only redeeming value here is that it runs off of 12v and includes a 12v plug (cig plug). Other than that, there are way better TV's out there for less money than this if you don't need any of the 12v stuff.The sound quality on this tv is horrendous. It is muffled and flat. Luckily, our little camper has a sound system that I plan to use for sound instead. So, it gets a pass.The picture is not great. In fact, out of the box the picture is really bad. However, with some adjustments in the menu it can be made better. For some reason it has a "noise reduction" mode which, from what I can tell, all it does is make the picture softer by blurring the edges. So, turn that off. Then it's so oversaturated that you might need to turn down the contrast a touch and the color a bit. That should help it improve.Lastly, I needed to mount this thing to the camper wall. The two top M4 screws on the mount would go in just fine. However, the two bottom ones would not. They turned in about 1/8 inch and would stop. Looking inside the screw hole shows something in the way.The pros here are that it is small enough to fit in our small camper, it does have a full HD screen (many TV's this size are only 720p), and it is 12v which is kinda hard to find.Overall, not a good experience with this TV. I have another week to decide to return it or keep it so, we'll see.
Pas satisfait de la qualité du produit ainsi que sa performance.
